introduction: Half ticket is a story of co-incidences and luck that will leave you with a smile on your face. The film revolves around Ayaan (Naveen Kasturia) and Rhea (Gunjan Malhotra) who happen to have really hectic jobs. It starts with Ayaan giving his boss an excuse on a Saturday for not being able to attend an office meeting on Sunday and Rhea handling irritating clients on a Saturday night. They both co-incidentally or say luckily get their respective half ticket to a blind date with each other the next day i.e. Sunday. They meet each other the next afternoon and the rest is how they spend a fun day together at the turf.
